title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and 

Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited historic archaeological heritage miscellaneous provision act 2023 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation:
heading: 2. The 12th day of December 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 12th day of December 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 132; 

(b) 

section 134; 

(c) Chapter 2 of Part 5; 

(d) Part 7; 

(e) 

(f) 

section 216; 

sections 222 and 223. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 November, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [663] 3
